title: residence设定
author: abdohung3
txt_content:
本帖最后由 abdohung3 于 2020-3-1 04:46 编辑 

想问一下residence怎样可以让伺服器的玩家能拥有一个免费领地?(例如:我想让玩家们都有一个20x20的免费领地，等有钱了再自己扩大，就是大于20x20就要付钱这样)能做到吗?急

replies.author: 神奈川归尘
replies.txt_content:
NewPlayer:
    Use: true
    # Setting this to true, residence will be created for free
    # By setting to false, money will be taken from player, if he has them
    Free: true
    # Range from placed chest o both sides. By setting to 5, residence will be 5+5+1 = 11 blocks wide
    Range:
      X: 10
      Y: 10
      Z: 10复制代码

/res expand 扩展领地

replies.author: a341132
replies.txt_content:
https://www.mcbbs.net/forum.php?mod=viewthread&tid=631343&mobile=2

replies.author: Sssss...
replies.txt_content:
在config.yml下面找到新玩家自动创建

Free: true（免费）
下面的range是领地半径
